title: Roman Pomazan
text:
Roman Pomazan (; born 5 September 1994 in <a href="Berdiansk">Berdiansk</a>, <a href="Zaporizhia%20Oblast">Zaporizhia Oblast</a>, <a href="Ukraine">Ukraine</a>) is a <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a> who plays for <a href="FC%20Dinaz%20Vyshhorod">Dinaz Vyshhorod</a>.
Career.
Pomazan is a product of youth team system of Azovstal Mariupol. His first trainer was Eduard Bondarenko.
Made his debut for FC Metalurh in the match against <a href="FC%20Chornomorets%20Odesa">FC Chornomorets Odesa</a> on 15 May 2015 in the <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a>.
In 2019, Pomazan joined Armenian club <a href="FC%20Yerevan">FC Yerevan</a>.
